channel.title: MAXIMUM THRESHOLD RADIO SHOW http://maximumthreshold.net
channel.description:
MAXIMUM THRESHOLD RADIO SHOW: Is an internet radio show dedicated to presenting up and coming hard rock bands and current successful bands as well as interviews, news and music reviews.
Give this show a listen and pass us around to your friends. Click HERE to check out the Maximum Threshold Show international website. We are addictive and so is the music that we present for your listening pleasure. So crank those speakers and crack open a cold one and give us a listen and check out these bands.
Please get involved in this site and post in the forum at Maximum Threshold Forum with your comments and recommendations.
Remember that there are "No Limits To MAXIMUM THRESHOLD"
Please visit our website at MAXIMUMTHRESHOLD.NET

image.title: Maximum Threshold Radio Show Archives http://maximumthreshold.net

item.title: MAXIMUM THRESHOLD RADIO SHOW #43 It was a FREEVIL Night! http://maximumthreshold.net

description.xmlns: This is a sample item in a feed, created by Jitbit RSS Feed Creator. NOTE: this item description should be edited.

item.description:
This week's show was a blast. No interviews, just some awesome music, some wacky news and of course the Billboard Top 10. Watch the video stream of the show. It was an overall funny show. I rank it pretty high. Give it a listen.
Music played: Freevil, Black Tractor, Meltdown, 3SO - 30 Seconds Out, Phanatos, Sunless Daze, Blackwater, BroknStone and much more!!

item.title: MAXIMUM THRESHOLD SHOW #36 ROCKSTAR CAGE MATCH W/ OZZY, EDDY VAN HALEN, RONNIE JAMES DIO, MARILYN MANSON VS SLAYER PLUS MUCH MORE: http://maximumthreshold.net

description.xmlns: This is a sample item in a feed, created by Jitbit RSS Feed Creator. NOTE: this item description should be edited.

item.description:
Maximum Threshold Show takes to the show on the road, this time to cover the Rockstar Death Cage Match featuring: Tag Team fight w/ Eddie Van Halen and Eddie Money vs Eddie Vetter and Eddie Ojeda (Dubbed the Battle of the Eddie's), Ozzy vs Joe Cocker, Ronnie James Dio vs Gene Simmons, Marilyn Manson vs the entire band Slayer (featured death match), Special fight 50 Cent vs Flava Flav and Snoop Dogg in a handicap match. (Listen to the show for winners!!)
Music news: Bumblefoot, Joe Elliot (Def Leppard), Get Thrashed Director,Rush, Drowning Pool tour dates, Bruce Kulik solo record, Exodus new songs, LA Guns Love/Hate Faster Pussycat members perform at Erotic Ball, Iced Earth new video, The Cult: new songs, Slash, Venom, Nikki Sixx, Van Halen tour dates, Paul Stanley emmy award, Zakk Wylde, Dave Mustaine (We called Dave), Mijovi lawsuit, Anthrax, Chris Caffery, Billboard Top 10 Music Played: Freevil, Baghead, Color Blind Aggression, Faces of March, Eldimur Krimm, Trigger Point, El Sid, Suicide Circus, Evolocity, Rebel Girl, Radio Cult, Overloaded, Eddie Ojeda, and much much more 3 hour show!!

item.title: MAXIMUM THRESHOLD SHOW #35 w/JUSTIN EMORD & ROB WERTHNER (HOT ACTION COP)

description.xmlns: This is a sample item in a feed, created by Jitbit RSS Feed Creator. NOTE: this item description should be edited.

item.description:
This is an explosive show with Justin Emord, and Rob Werthner. Justin talks about the happenings at the Summer NAMM 2007. Rob Werthner discussed what Hot Action Cop has been up to.
Music news: Marilyn Manson lawsuit, Pogo, Korn - Terry Bozzio, Heavy Metal Doesn't Belong In Mesa, Councilman Says, Gene Simmons Family Jewels' To Premiere In Canada With Three-Hour Mini-Marathon, MARILYN MANSON Calls Former Bandmate's Allegations 'Ridiculous, LIFE OF AGONY Drummer Seeks Musicians For New Project, SLAYER's KERRY KING Says Band Will Not Do Any More Touring This Year,STATIC-X Going For A 'Harder And More Metallic' Approach, KILLSWITCH ENGAGE: ADAM DUTKIEWICZ To Leave VANS WARPED TOUR, GODSMACK Might Launch Acoustic Tour In November, WARPED TOUR Organizer Apologizes To SHARON OSBOURNE For OZZFEST Remarks,ROB ZOMBIE: Live Album Track Listing Revealed, SCORPIONS: More North American Tour Dates Announced, Billboard Top 10.
Music played: Black Tractor, Stymeed, John Macaluso, Freevil, Eldrimur Krimm, Suicide Circus, Color Blind Aggression, El Sid, Hot Action Cop, Justin Emord and much much much more!!

item.title: MAXIMUM THRESHOLD SHOW #34 - UNPLUGGED SHOW!!

description.xmlns: This is a sample item in a feed, created by Jitbit RSS Feed Creator. NOTE: this item description should be edited.

item.description:
This week's show is might different than any other show that has previously been on Maximum Threshold. This is the "unplugged" show, in which all it is, is news, no commercials, no music, just straight info, and its short!
Music News: Dream Theater signs with Roadrunner,FREDDIE MERCURY, JIMI HENDRIX Top Supergroup Poll, PAUL DI'ANNO: I'm Not The Right Guy For The ANTHRAX Singer Job,LED ZEPPELIN: Double-CD Collection, Reissue Of 'The Song Remains The Same' Due In November, DOWN: New Album,DORO, SAXON, W.A.S.P., U.D.O. Confirmed For Germany's HEAVY CHRISTMAS MEETING,JIMMY PAGE Testifies In Bootlegging Trial,PETER CRISS: 'I'm A Kid Inside And The Music Keeps Me Young',GUNS N' ROSES Guitarist Sings 'Knockin' On Heaven's Door' In Japan,IRON MAIDEN, DRAGONFORCE Songs Added To 'Guitar Hero III,BAM MARGERA Brings Scandinavian 'Sleaze Rock' To The States ,HENRY ROLLINS Says War In Iraq 'Never Was A Good Idea,MATT SORUM Says New METALLICA Songs Are 'Sick' And 'Crazy Fast' With Lots Of 'Tempo Changes,Soilwork,JUDAS PRIEST, IRON MAIDEN, MOTÃ–RHEAD, SLAYER Tracks Featured On 'Heavy Metal Box',Rocklahoma Sets Stage for 2008,James Hetfield Dicusses The Band's Current Setlist, The New Album And "Master Of Puppets,Billboard Top 10

item.title: MAXIMUM THRESHOLD SHOW #30 - SCARLETT POMERS, JAK PARIS, AARON - EVOLOCITY, JOHN MACALUSO http://maximumthreshold.net

description.xmlns: This is a sample item in a feed, created by Jitbit RSS Feed Creator. NOTE: this item description should be edited.

item.description:
Powerhouse show with much talent! Scarlett talked about the organizations, acting and rocking out on stage, Jak Paris spoke about his new record and "Chains" and Minarik Guitars as well as recording, Aaron spoke about touring, recording and history of Evolocity, Johnny Mac spoke about being a drummer with his new record and all the friends he had on it, and was really funny (A must listen to) Music news: Dio not wanting to do another Black Sabbath album, Project Revolution - bring the pyro!, Gidget Gein coming on the show next week, Sepultura guitaris swallows tv remote control battery, Marilyn Manson's unauthorized biography "Long Road ouf of Hell, Joey Vera filling in for Jim Sheppard of Nevermore, John Petrucci and Mike Portnoy discuss the songwriting process, Soilwork - new record, Death Angel- Oegueda tears eyeball, Rage Against The Machine tour, Mike Wead launches Probulator, King Diamond postpones European tour due to back problem, Get Thrashed movie, and much more!!
Music played: Gidget Gein, Evolocity, John Macaluso, Crimson Heart, Alexx Calise, Scalera, Color Blind Aggression, Radio Cult, King Diamond, and much much much more!

item.title: MAXIMUM THRESHOLD SHOW - Hard Rock/Metal #7 INTERVIEW W/ STEVE SMYTH OF NEVERMORE

description.xmlns: This is a sample item in a feed, created by Jitbit RSS Feed Creator. NOTE: this item description should be edited.

item.description: Interview with Steve Smyth of Nevermore, Dragonlord and Vicious Rumors. Music to include: Nevermore, Dragonlord, Vicious Rumors, Antikythera, Domonic, Color Blind Aggression, The Broadview Gutters, American Rust, and Ronny North
